attributes.action: Apply pressure on the Chinese Government over the treatment of Uyghur Muslims
attributes.additional_details:
BBC report on China's "re-education" camps and systematic detention of Uyghurs:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/resources/idt-sh/China_hidden_camps

Vox report on Xinjiang and "re-education" camps:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cMkHcZ5IwjU

SBS News report on video footage of mass detention of Uyghurs:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xU_w5UzdZEs

Vox report by journalist Sigal Samuels on China's crackdown on the Uyghur people:
https://www.vox.com/2019/4/30/18523056/china-uighur-muslims-sigal-samuel-ama

China Tribunal presents evidence to UN on forced organ harvesting from Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities: 
https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/asia/china-religious-ethnic-minorities-uighur-muslim-harvest-organs-un-human-rights-a9117911.html
attributes.background: It has been widely reported and corroborated that China's crackdown on the ethnic Uyghur Muslims is tantamount to ethnic cleansing. Many Uyghur people are enduring imprisonment in so called "re-education" camps where over 1 million people are detained and forced to renounce their faith and culture.
